channel.title: Umm can I just have a simple server?
channel.description:
Every server I've seen has retarted features that allow you to level up instantly and teleport to random places. I just want something like HybridScape where the start spot is normal, the features are the same as RS, and nothing special. I will modify everything I need inside the files.
I've searched this site and others I just can't find it so could somebody give me a link to it? The reason I won't just use HybridScape is because I can't change a lot of things...

Ok thanks…I’ll pm you now.

item.title: Umm can I just have a simple server?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

Milk and Java™:

Just ask somebody for winterlove’s source, whitescape or testscape. Or actually go to r-s where people know what they are talking about

Umm…?

I also spent all day looking for a server not full of crap…Nothing, so I made this post.

Read full topic
item.source: Umm can I just have a simple server?

item.title: Umm can I just have a simple server?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[hr][quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:14, topic:177363”]If delta was on he’d probably tell him to change his name to thegirlwhogoton or something[/quote]

Lol.

I read some of the posts at the beginning of the thread, you don’t need net beans. Just get a simple editor. Notepad++ perhaps? Though the editing will be very slow, due to the amount of methods inside your client class.

I suggest just editing it in notepad, i do better in that, then in notepad++, oh and if you get the infamous ‘100 errors’ or an error relating to a bracket or something like that, Now you use notepad++ to where the error is, might try going to where you were editing and seeing where each beginning bracket ends, to see if it placed correctly, or even there.

–

I didn’t say use testscape, this is my… 3rd post here or 2nd.

Umm go to download section, select a server that suits you, or is stable. I prefer stable, dodian is a no no because everyone uses it. So be unique.

Once downloaded you can start editing. I’m guessing you know how to edit the basic things: Starting point, starting items, messages, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Umm can I just have a simple server?

item.title: Umm can I just have a simple server?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

[quote=“Milk and Java™, post:15, topic:177363”]It’s still not easier, not matter what. Especially for somebody who didn’t know how to open a java file.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2008, 02:21:46 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Java Is My Bitch™ link=topic=238264.msg2024467#msg2024467 date=1201828777]
If delta was on, he would say something toward that.
[/quote]

If delta was on he’d probably tell him to change his name to thegirlwhogoton or something[/quote]

Wow you guys don’t know who I am that’s the first…

They added too much useless stuff to their servers I was also curious if there was an easier way than using NotePad or NotePad++ to edit a Java file.

Now somebody started somewhere not everybody took a source, and if there is a good server that I can use why can’t you just post it? You guys told me to use TestScape so don’t blame me.

Edit: Well if you guys will just be jackasses I’ll just move on to something else.

Read full topic

item.source: Umm can I just have a simple server?

item.title: Umm can I just have a simple server?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Sorry but your wrong(Referring to “TheGuyWhoGotOn”).

It actually would take longer to make a server from scratch, then to actually edit one that’s already “made”. Just ask every person who has released a source into the download section, none of them started from scratch, they just downloaded someones server, and put useless shit into it, like you’ve mentioned above. Sorry but glowing people is very gay.

Plus the advantage of these servers now, is that people actually do something helpful, as in fix some bugs it might have, or a solution, EG: “Reseting of players”. Make it save backup files, and if they get reset, they can load it themselves.

[quote=“TheGuyWhoGotOn, post:13, topic:177363”][quote author=Milk and Java™ link=topic=238264.msg2024451#msg2024451 date=1201828478]

There would be more work in fixing them than starting from scratch…[/quote]
LMAO! If you think so, I edit **** sources all the time, my mind couldn’t begin to comprhend making a server from scratch, making all your filed tie in together, making all the login packets and everything else…

I meant other servers as opposed to TestScape or another very basic server.[/quote]

If delta was on, he would say something toward that.

The name of it “TestScape”, Doesn’t that give it away? It was a test server, it has many bugs, which in turn will take quite a long time to find and remedy the problem(s).

Read full topic

Edit: Oh wow this server needs some work…When you level up your levels don’t actually go up…

item.title: Umm can I just have a simple server?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

Ok thanks.

Ok I got TestScape…I just need to know how to make it try to connect with 127.0.0.1 and not 0.0.0.0…

Also Compile.bat looks like:

@echo off title TestScape Compiler javac *.java pause

But I get an error about javac every time I run it.

Edit: Whoa I think I got it working now…Kinda it keeps logging me out and the server says it’s connected on 0.0.0.0.0…

Read full topic
